structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Appeals And Post Conviction Remedies; Indigent Representation
law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 68, Sec. 117. See 2011, 68, Sec. 221.] The public counsel division, except in cases of conflict of interest, shall represent indigent defendants in all appeals and related post-conviction remedies. In the case of a conflict of interest, the assignment shall be to the private counsel division.
